content:
Subject: Agentic AI

Dear Lemessa Ahmed,

Thank you for your email and for your interest in learning more about Artificial Intelligence (AI). We appreciate your inquiry and are happy to provide you with information on this topic.

Here are the next steps we recommend to proceed:

* We will schedule a meeting to discuss AI in more detail and answer any questions you may have.
* In the meantime, we will prepare a comprehensive presentation on the current state of AI and its applications.
* We will send you a calendar invite with the meeting details once it is scheduled.

Please let us know if you have any specific questions or topics you would like us to cover during the meeting. We look forward to discussing AI with you further.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
